summary: Documentary about Dutch artist Ellen ten Damme and her battle against breast cancer at age 38.
cast: Robin Berlijn|Xander de Buisonjé|Wilfried de Jong|Bart de Valk|Udo Lindenberg|Hans Sierhuis|Ellen Ten Damme|Maurice van Wanrooy|Thomas Vandenberghe|Heleen Willeboordse
title: Ellen ten Damme: As I Was Wondering Where This Mixed-up Little Life of Mine Was Leading To
